description: Manage Digital Twins instance private-endpoint connections.

commands.name: az dt network private-endpoint connection delete
commands.summary: Delete a private-endpoint connection associated with the Digital Twins instance.
commands.syntax:
az dt network private-endpoint connection delete --cn
                                                 --dt-name
                                                 [--no-wait]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--yes]
examples: az dt network private-endpoint connection delete -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f
az dt network private-endpoint connection delete -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f -y --no-wait

commands.name: az dt network private-endpoint connection list
commands.summary: List private-endpoint connections associated with the Digital Twins instance.
commands.syntax:
az dt network private-endpoint connection list --dt-name
                                               [--resource-group]
examples: az dt network private-endpoint connection list -n {instance_name}

commands.name: az dt network private-endpoint connection set
commands.summary: Set the state of a private-endpoint connection associated with the Digital Twins instance.
commands.syntax:
az dt network private-endpoint connection set --cn
                                              --dt-name
                                              --status {Approved, Disconnected, Pending, Rejected}
                                              [--actions-required]
                                              [--desc]
                                              [--group-ids]
                                              [--no-wait]
                                              [--resource-group]
examples: az dt network private-endpoint connection set -n {instance_name} --cn {connection_name} --status Approved --desc "A description."
az dt network private-endpoint connection set -n {instance_name} --cn {connection_name} --status Rejected --desc "Does not comply."

commands.name: az dt network private-endpoint connection show
commands.summary: Show a private-endpoint connection associated with the Digital Twins instance.
commands.syntax:
az dt network private-endpoint connection show --cn
                                               --dt-name
                                               [--resource-group]
examples: az dt network private-endpoint connection show -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f

commands.name: az dt network private-endpoint connection wait
commands.summary: Wait until an operation on a private-endpoint connection is complete.
commands.syntax:
az dt network private-endpoint connection wait --cn
                                               --dt-name
                                               [--custom]
                                               [--deleted]
                                               [--interval]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--timeout]
                                               [--updated]
examples: az dt network private-endpoint connection wait -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f --updated
az dt network private-endpoint connection wait -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f --deleted
az dt network private-endpoint connection wait -n {instance_name} --cn ba8408b6-1372-41b2-aef8-af43afc4729f --custom "properties.privateLinkServiceConnectionState.actionsRequired=='None'"
